title: Spin micromobility program contracts and agreement (Office Of The City Manager)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following documents relating to the operation of Spin electric scooter (e-scooter) sharing systems within your city:

- copies of regulations, policies, or ordinances governing the operation of Spin e-bikes and e-scooters within the City of Davis
- The final agreements between UC Davis, the City of Davis and Spin as well as all earlier iterations of the agreement (drafts)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Kent

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

In December 2018, the Pittsburgh Bureau of Police conducted a comprehensive live-fire test of the ShotSpotter system. I am looking for: 

- Emails between SoundThinking (formerly ShotSpotter) representatives and members of the Pittsburgh Bureau of Police about these tests from December 2017 until January 2020
- Any internal memos or communications regarding the live-fire tests conducted in December 2018
- Any and all images, body camera footage, or videos of Pittsburgh Bureau of Police employees conducting these tests.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dhruv Mehrotra

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a file of the total number of drug-related (Narcotics, Opioids, Opiates, and Methenamines) arrests from January 1st 2022- October 15th 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mallory Loftus

title: UC Davis grant for bicyclist and pedestrian safety

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide all application details, including the application itself, for the grant from the the California Office of Traffic Safety received in 2023 in the amount of $71,250 for bicycle and pedestrian safety programming and education. Please also provide any progress reports and/or program details related to the grant.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Kent

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide all biannual progress reports shared with the Bicycle Advisory Commission and City Council highlighting progress and status of programmatic endeavors related to the Beyond Platinum Bicycle Action Plan. Please provide all reports between 2014 and 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Kent
